home.title: ArenaOne
home.welcomeMessage: This is an example card component using rsp- prefixed classes for structure and styling.
home.exampleModalContent: This is an example modal dialog. Press Escape or click outside to close.
home.heroSubheadline: Discover and book courts at the best padel clubs near you
home.feature1Desc: Book courts in seconds with our simple and intuitive booking system.
home.feature2Desc: Access the best padel clubs with quality courts and facilities.
home.feature3Desc: Connect with professional coaches to improve your game.

personalized.title: Your Personalized Section
personalized.quickBookingDescription: Book your next padel session in just a few clicks.
personalized.selectClubStep: Select a club to get started
personalized.selectClubHint: Select the club where you want to play

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Search for padel clubs near you using our intuitive search and filtering system.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose your preferred time slot and book instantly with real-time availability.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Enjoy your game and track your training progress with professional coaches.

clubsCoaches.title: Featured Clubs & Coaches
clubsCoaches.club1Desc: Premium indoor courts with professional lighting and climate control.
clubsCoaches.club2Desc: Beautiful outdoor courts with stunning views and top facilities.
clubsCoaches.club3Desc: Modern urban facility with flexible booking and expert coaching.
clubsCoaches.coach1Desc: Former professional player with 10+ years of coaching experience.
clubsCoaches.coach2Desc: Certified coach specializing in beginners and intermediate players.
clubsCoaches.coach3Desc: Technical expert focused on advanced strategy and match preparation.

testimonials.title: What Our Players Say
testimonials.testimonial1Text: Amazing platform! I found my favorite club and improved my game significantly with their coaching program.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: The booking system is so easy to use. I can book courts anytime, anywhere. Highly recommend!
testimonials.testimonial3Text: Great variety of clubs and coaches. The quality of service has exceeded my expectations.
testimonials.testimonial4Text: Finally, a platform that makes finding and booking padel courts hassle-free. Love it!
